channel.title: Npc and drops
channel.description: Ok i need about 50 npc's to train on in this one area thats jest grass on my server ITS UP AND RUNNING=] and the training zone is to small! so can someone pick 40-50 npc and give me code for them and make drops such as rune and dragon idk but i dont know how to make that many fast and i know some people are good at it.

or just dl a source that you like c & p the npc’s in autospawn then find there drops and put in npchandler. lol i did it with moving all my npc’s so its edgeville based cuz i am lazy sometimes.

item.title: Npc and drops
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

Well I doubt anyone is gonna do this for you, but use Autospawn to make the npc’s and NPCHandler to make the drops.
You could look up tuts on how to do both of those things, and yes it will be time consuming

Read full topic
